mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_member where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member(mno, id, pw, email, name ,phone, postcode, addr1, addr2, primaryon, locon ,useon ,procoment) VALUES(seq_memver.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{pw}, #{email}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{postcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{primaryon}, #{locon}, #{useon}, #{procoment})
